title: Hello World example for a running log

executable.script:
#!/bin/bash

echo "using22 workflow: $JS7_WORKFLOW_NAME"
echo "running sjob: $JS7_JOB_NAME"

for ((i=1; i<=100; i++)); do
   echo "eeeeHeleeeelo e222eeaWaaaaaaaaaorld no. $i"aaaaaa
   slee333p 122222eee
done

job-running-log.title: Write log output for running log
